rukus.text: 15|80|(ivvare) ‘hijr' ennum itattilirunta (samutu ennum) makkalum nam tutarkalaip poyyakkik kontiruntanar
15|81|nam avarkalukku namatu (pala) attatcikalaik kotuttiruntum, avarrai avarkal purakkanittuk konte vantarkal
15|82|accamarru valalam enak karuti avarkal malaikalaik kutaintu vitukal amaittarkal
15|83|avarkalaiyum vitiyarkalaiyil (perum) captam pitittukkontatu
15|84|avarkal (tankalai patukattuk kolla) ceytiruntavarril onrume avarkalukkup palanalikka villai

15|85|vanankalaiyum pumiyaiyum, ivarrukku mattiyil ullavarraiyum takka karanaminri nam pataikkavillai. (Napiye! Ivarkalutaiya tantanaikkuriya) kalam niccayamaka varakkutiyate! (Atuvarai ittiyavarkalin visamattai) nir kanniyamana muraiyil purakkanittu varuviraka
15|86|niccayamaka umatu iraivane (anaittaiyum) pataittavan, ivarkal anaivaraiyum) nankarintavan avan
15|87|(napiye!) Niccayamaka nam umakku tirumpat tirumpa otappatakkutiya elu vacanankalai (utaiya ‘al'hamtu' ennum attiyayattai)yum, inta makattana (mulu) kur'anaiyum alittirukkirom

15|88|(Pavikalakiya) ivarkal (ivvulakil) pala vakaikalilum cukamanupavikka ivarkalukku nam kotuttiruppavarrin pakkam nir umatu iru kankalaiyum nittatir; nir ivarkalukkaka kavalaiyum patatir. Eninum, nir nampikkaiyalarkalukku umatu panivana anpaik kattuviraka
15|89|‘‘niccayamaka nan telivana accamutti eccarikkai ceykiravan'' enrum kuruviraka
15|90|(napiye! Munnulla vetankalaip) palavarakap pirittavarkal mitu munnar nam (vetanaiyai) irakkiyavare
15|91|intak kur'anaip palavarakap pirippavarkal mitum (vetanaiyai irakki vaippom)
15|92|(akave,) umatu iraivan mitu cattiyamaka! Avarkal anaivaritamum kelvi kanakkuk ketpom
15|93|avarkal enna ceytu kontiruntarkal enpataip parri
15|94|akave, umakku evappattatai(t tayakkaminri) nir avarkalukku vivarittarivittu vituviraka. Melum, inaivaittu vanankum ivarkalaip purakkanittu vituviraka
15|95|parikacam ceyyum (ivarkalutaiya tinkai vittu) niccayamaka name um'maip patukappom
15|96|ivarkal (um'maip parikacippatu mattuma?) Allahvukku marroru (poyt) teyvattaik kuttakkukirarkal. (Itan palanai) pinnar ivarkal arintu kolvarkal
15|97|(napiye! Um'maip parri) avarkal (kevalamakak) kurupavai umatu ullattai nerukkukiratu enpatai niccayamaka nam arivom. (Atai nir oru ciritum porutpatuttatir)
15|98|nir umatu iraivanait tuti ceytu pukalntu avanukkuc ciram panintu vanankuviraka
15|99|umakku ‘ekin' (ennum maranam) erpatum varai (ivvare) umatu iraivanai vanankik kontiruppiraka
